name: Angerhof
description: Enjoy a relaxing winter or summer holiday in the "Angerhof" with the Emberger family. One holiday apartment suitable for 2-5 persons situated in a sunny, quiet position, with sun bathing area. The Horbergbahn can be found very close by.
Details of children's discounts available on request.
Use the B169 until the turnoff for the Horbergbahn/Burgstall. Before the Horberg lift turn left at the roundabout and drive through MÃ¼hlbach and then Burgstall. Our house can be found on the right.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Our farm can be found approx. 1km from Mayrhofen. The holdiay apartment is situated in a neighbouring house on the second floor. A pleasant, quiet location in the middle of a orchard.
